headline: Q4 Earnings Roundup: Kennametal (NYSE:KMT) And The Rest Of The Professional Tools and Equipment Segment
summary: Earnings results often indicate what direction a company will take in the months ahead. With Q4 behind us, let’s have a look at Kennametal (NYSE:KMT) and its peers.
